dict.string: Shop For Dress
Shop for your dress and buy it. Make sure to schedule your alteration and obtain a fabric swatch if possible.
Make Hair Appointment
Hair salons are busy during prom season, make sure to make your appointments.
Reserve Limo
If you and your friends are planning to arrive in style, make sure to reserve a limo.
Discuss After-Prom Plans
If you and your friends plan to do things after prom, start talking about what you are going to do.
Shop For Shoes
Go to a shoe store and start shopping for the kind of shoe you want.
Shop For Special Undergarments
Start shopping for your special bra or Spanx.
Shop For Evening Bag
If you don't already have a purse or evening bag to store everything, shop for one around two months out.
Shop For Jewelry
If you want to jazz things up a bit, add some jewelry to your outfit.
Remind Date to Select Tux
Provide a fabric swatch to your date to match the color of your dress with his tie and cummerbund.
Buy Prom Tickets
Your school should start getting the word out about days to buy tickets. Make sure to bring school ID with you.
Pick Up Dress
Pick up your dress so that you actually have it for the day of prom.
Order Boutonniere
Order the boutonniere for your date's lapel.
Remind Date To Order Corsage
Remind your date to order the corsage, hopefully he still has the fabric swatch you gave him for matching.
Make Manicure/Pedicure Appointments
Schedule appointment(s) at a local nail salon.
Break In Shoes
While you are bored or doing homework, break in your shoes by walking around in them at home.
Look for Photos For Your Hairstyle
Look online or in magazines of a clip of a hairstyle you want. This makes it a lot easier for your hair stylist.
Makeup Dry Run
Put on all your makeup to see how it looks/matches the rest of your outfit.
Facial
If you want, get a facial at a local salon.
Spray Tan
If you want, get a spray tan to look your best for prom.
Remind Date About Tux
Remind your date to pick up his tux, corsage, and get a haircut.
Wash and Vacuum Car
If you aren't taking a limo, make sure to wash and vacuum the car you are going in.
Go To The ATM
Get some money so that you can enjoy the night without worrying about money.
Pack Your Evening Bag
Pack your bag with lip-gloss, gum, money, camera and other things you may need.
Hair Appointment
Show up to your hair appointment. IMPORTANT: Make sure to wear a button-front shirt so you can remove it without messing up your hair.
Manicure/Pedicure Appointments
Go to your manicure/pedicure appointments.
Pick Up Flowers
After picking up your flowers, make sure to refrigerate them to keep them fresh.
